channel.title: Equality, what?
channel.description:
I was just browsing through the runescape site and decided to take a look at the new membership costs since they've been increased by $0,95 for USD etc etc. When I logged in to the upgrade area I clicked pay with credit card, and it showed EUR:5,95. What the hell? That's $8,7! I changed the country from Finland to United States and now it showed USD:5,95.
Basically people in europe pay $2,5 more than people in the states which is totally unfair. I think it's a bug.

item.title: Equality, what?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“reVein, post:7, topic:228111”][quote author=cooper link=topic=299792.msg2483035#msg2483035 date=1223664134]

an extra .95 cents for trade limit and bounty hunter… i quit rs im gonna play paposcape now ^-^

$11.40 isn’t really that much when spread out over an entire year, and there are still lots of other things to do in RuneScape… the trade limit really isn’t that big of a deal for most people, and it benefits many, as does safer wilderness.
[/quote]Omg be QUITE cooper you don’t know anything!! Noob.

You don know wut trade limit is, couldn’t use one if i put gun to head and said use OR I FIRE!!![/quote]
I have to admit, that made me laugh.

Read full topic

Just because of the fucking euro, look like they have 5.95 on both to be easy to remember.

Weird thing is the other prices than creditcard is written in NOK (Norwegian krone), but the creditcard options is in EUROs.
